    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        After the class has been instantiated and the tableau has been initialized the execution is started by this method.

      • locatePivotElement

        private int[] locatePivotElement()
        Locates the pivot element, i.e. the most negative element in the objective row.
        Returns:
        The row ID and the column ID of the pivot element in an integer array of size of two.

      • pivot

        private void pivot(int rowId,
         int colId)
        Executes the pivot.
        Parameters:
        rowId - The row ID of the pivot element.
        colId - THe column ID of the pivot element.

      • normalizeRow

        private void normalizeRow(int rowId,
                double denominator)
        Normalizes a row, i.e. denominates the row by the pivot element. This step is required to reach a uniform unit column, i.e. where only ones and zeros are present.
        Parameters:
        rowId - The ID of the row.
        denominator - The value of the pivot element.

      • solutionIsFeasibile

        private boolean solutionIsFeasibile()
        Checks whether the reached solution is feasible or not.
        Returns:
        Is the solution feasible?

      • isPivotPossible

        private boolean isPivotPossible()
        Checks whether a pivot is possible or not.
        Returns:
        Is a pivot possible?
